Definition:Â  Original Claimant
An
original claimant
is the deceased claimant whose claim, decision review request, or appeal of an adverse decision on the claim was pending when they died.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B  - Substitution in Case of Death of Claimant
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B
